system.description:
Trigger: The user is targeted by a damaging attack.

Effect: The user changes to a Type that can resist the damage of the triggering attack for 7 Activations or until switched out. If the user is posseses more than one Type, it changes the Type of its choice.

actions.name: Conversion 2
